definition[0]: an animal, especially a horse, that is skittish gets excited or frightened very easily
definition[1]: a person who is skittish is not very serious, and their feelings, behaviour, and opinions keep changing
definition[2]: if people who buy shares are skittish, they are nervous and worried about them dropping in value, and might sell the shares that they own because of this
example[0]: Some skittish Wall Street investors are staying away from the market.
